titulo: Thematic Networks of Excellence for AI in Science (RAISE pilot) (RIA)
descricao: Expected Outcome:Scientific progress with the help of AI, addressing strategic scientific challenges in the thematic areas selected;Pilot networks of excellent labs in the selected thematic areas to pool talent and expertise as part of a Resource for AI Science in Europe (RAISE), operating as a virtual institute across Europe;Establish a model of cooperation among these labs and support the development of a strategic research agenda for the application of AI in scientific research in the selecte
